title: X-Men v4 04 (2013) (Tablet Edition)
description:
I adjusted the resolution and compression of the original scan for easier reading on tablets and to save space. All credit goes to the original scanner for their hard work. I have added 'Tablet Edition' to the name to avoid confusion.

Enjoy and please seed back.


X-Men 04

By:     	Brian Wood, Olivier Coipel, Amanda Connor	
Type:   	Comics
Genres:   	Superhero
Series:   	X-Men
Publisher:   	Marvel Comics	
Pub. Date:  	August 21, 2013
Format:         CBZ

After the game-changing events of PRIMER, the women of the X-Men must contemplate the future of their makeshift team.

Are the X-women ready for the BATTLE OF THE ATOM that's right around the corner?

Meanwhile: Jubilee may still look like a kid, but she finds herself burdened with some very adult responsibilities. What kind of plans can a mutant vampire teen mom make for her own future?
